channel.title: Blog on Philip Mitroi
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Philip Mitroi

item.title: Some Updates
item.description:
You probably noticed by now that my images don’t scale. This is the next step in the devellopment of this website. Currently there is no native way to implmenet dynamic scaling to images in Hugo, the site generator I am using. Luckily for me, the internet hasn’t slept on this.

In the next week, I plan to implement one of these two gallery solutions to the site for a better viewing experience. A gallery will allow me to consolidate more work in one page, and strengthen the intention of a personal website as a hub for my work, rather than stretching content across different platforms and sites.

https://www.liwen.id.au/photoswipe/

https://github.com/icecreammatt/hugo-gallery

Please feel free to contact me with advice regarding this devellopment. As a novice web dev, feedback is appreciated.
